WorkItem.Description:
I found out that something causes ModernProgressRing Style property to fail ___ONLY___ on .NET 4.0, while __working fine on .NET 4.5__.

Specifically, when I try to change the Style property of a ModernProgressRing control to say Style="{StaticResource CircleProgressRingStyle}" or any other style (I have tried ALL styles), it raises a XAMLParseException, with the designer complaining that "The resource "CircleProgressRingStyle" could not be resolved" __on design-time__.

Comments.Message: I get the same thing, works in 4.5... but not in 4.0. :(
